mapper.sql: select id, student_user_id, assignment_id, question_id, answer_content, is_correct, score, answer_time, is_deleted, delete_time, from student_answer
mapper.select: SELECT sa.assignment_id AS assignmentId, aq.sequence AS sequence, a.title AS assignmentName FROM student_answer sa JOIN assignment_question aq ON sa.question_id = aq.question_id JOIN assignment a ON sa.assignment_id = a.id WHERE sa.student_user_id = #{studentUserId} AND sa.is_correct = 0 AND sa.is_deleted = 0 AND aq.is_deleted = 0 AND a.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY sa.assignment_id, aq.sequence, a.title ORDER BY sa.assignment_id, aq.sequence;
